query.name: Pre-Cleanup - Remove Previous Test Data
query.description: Ensures clean state by removing any leftover objects from previous failed runs

query.name: Create Insert Test Table
query.description: Creates table for INSERT anomaly testing with multiple columns and indexes
query.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS data_insert_test (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, category VARCHAR(50), amount DECIMAL(10,2), status VARCHAR(20), data TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, INDEX idx_category (category), INDEX idx_status (status))

query.name: Baseline INSERT Hour 1
query.description: Hour 1 baseline - 50 INSERT operations with varied data
query.query: INSERT INTO data_insert_test (category, amount, status, data) VALUES ('Category_A', ROUND(RAND() * 1000, 2), 'active', CONCAT('Baseline Hour 1 - ', UUID()))

query.name: Baseline INSERT Hour 2
query.description: Hour 2 baseline - 50 INSERT operations with varied data
query.query: INSERT INTO data_insert_test (category, amount, status, data) VALUES ('Category_B', ROUND(RAND() * 2000, 2), 'pending', CONCAT('Baseline Hour 2 - ', UUID()))

query.name: Baseline INSERT Hour 3
query.description: Hour 3 baseline - 50 INSERT operations with varied data
query.query: INSERT INTO data_insert_test (category, amount, status, data) VALUES ('Category_C', ROUND(RAND() * 1500, 2), 'active', CONCAT('Baseline Hour 3 - ', UUID()))

query.name: Baseline INSERT Hour 4
query.description: Hour 4 baseline - 50 INSERT operations with varied data
query.query: INSERT INTO data_insert_test (category, amount, status, data) VALUES ('Category_D', ROUND(RAND() * 2500, 2), 'completed', CONCAT('Baseline Hour 4 - ', UUID()))

query.name: ANOMALY SPIKE - Massive INSERT Operations
query.description: HOUR 5 ANOMALY: 1000 rapid INSERT operations - 20x normal rate indicating potential data injection attack
query.query: INSERT INTO data_insert_test (category, amount, status, data) VALUES (CONCAT('Spike_', FLOOR(RAND() * 10)), ROUND(RAND() * 5000, 2), 'anomaly', CONCAT('SPIKE INSERT - Potential data injection - ', UUID()))

query.name: Verify INSERT Operations
query.description: Verify total records inserted and categorize by type
query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_records, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'anomaly' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as spike_records, SUM(CASE WHEN status IN ('active', 'pending', 'completed') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as baseline_records FROM data_insert_test
